title: Genshiken: Second Season, Vol. 2
description: THE MAIN EVENT LOOMS! Who has time for schoolwork when Comic-Fest is around the corner? With the deadline for their dojinshi looming, the Genshiken is starting to fray at the seams. And when Angela flies to Tokyo for the big event, one member of the group is in for a romantic rendezvous. When stress and libido collide, the sparks will fly!
author: Shimoku Kio
